page.title: 05Daily Life, Rangeworthy
page.content: {This is an ordinary school day}in the summer as described by a girl aged 11 living in the village. {At 8.00,}I get up , make the bed and get ready. {We have breakfast}at 8.10 and then I get my bag and packed lunch ready for school. At 8.25, I do my hair and go to school. I arrive at school at 8.40 and the bell goes for work to start at 9.00. {In school,}we have a morning assembly and then I do some Maths and English but we have a break at 10.30 when we play games. At 12.00, it is time for lunch and at 1.30 we go back into school to start work. {We go home}at 3.30 and from 3.45 to 4.30 I practise the piano. Then I have tea and at 5.15 we go swimming. After swimming I watch T.V. At 8.30, I have a shower and go to bed at 9.00.
